A Few Words To Begin With

Welcome to Heroes Base - the biggest database for Faerun's Heroes! Create Your profile to join Community & stay in touch with fellow adventurers.

What do we offer?

A platform where You can create your account and have access to posts & profiles of other hereos around.

What have I do to gain access?

Click on Register, fill and confirm the form to create your accont & enjoy this community.

What can I do on Heroes Base?

From the starters - create & maintain your account.
